summary:
• An accomplished professional with extensive experience in the management of Regulatory Affairs, Quality Assurance and Pharmacovigilance Systems.
• 4 years experience in the pharmaceutical industry with in-depth knowledge of current Good Manufacturing Practice (cGMP); current Good Distribution Practice (cGDP) and current Good Warehouse Practice (cGWP).
• Variation compilation and submissions to local authorities.
• Distribution experience related to pharmaceutical products, medical devices, and controlled substances.
• Quality and Regulatory management experience with extensive experience in management of Deviations, Change Controls and CAPAs.
